resources.string:
To create an event, you must first create an account and log in.

 You can do this by clicking the 3 vertical buttons in the top right corner of the screen and selecting "Login".

 Then, click the 'plus' sign on the bottom right corner of your device's screen.

 To change between a list view and map view of the events, click on one of the two buttons at the top of your screen.

 To filter events by category type, open the navigation drawer (top left button) and select the category you want.

 To view your starred events, open the navigation drawer (top left button) and select "My Events".
